author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 28-year-old murder accused was found dead at his residence in K.K. Valasu in Rasipuram here on Friday.

G. Kavindran was working in a water service station. He is accused number three in a murder case in Kondalampatti police station limits in Salem. On Thursday night, he interacted with his father Gunasekar and went home.

However, on Friday morning, he was found dead with blood in his nose. Neighbours informed Gunasekar who was residing in nearby village. Gunasekar suspected that his son could have been poisoned. Based on his complaint, the Rasipuram police registered a case under 174 CrPC (poisoning) and the body was taken to Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital in Salem. Post-mortem will be conducted on Saturday.
title: Murder accused found dead
